mapper.select: SELECT SCREEN_ID, FUNCTION_ID, INITIAL_KBN, TYPE_KBN, HELPER_NAME, GENERATION, DATA_SOURCE, COMMENTS, UP_JGI_NO, IS_DATE, UP_DATE, UP_SCRN_ID, UP_FUNC_ID FROM ORAUSR01.M_RDM_FW_HELPER_MATRIX WHERE SCREEN_ID = #{screenId} AND FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId}

SELECT SCREEN_ID, FUNCTION_ID, INITIAL_KBN, TYPE_KBN, HELPER_NAME, GENERATION, DATA_SOURCE, COMMENTS, UP_JGI_NO, IS_DATE, UP_DATE, UP_SCRN_ID, UP_FUNC_ID FROM ORAUSR01.M_RDM_FW_HELPER_MATRIX WHERE SCREEN_ID = #{screenId} AND FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId} FOR UPDATE
SELECT SCREEN_ID, FUNCTION_ID, INITIAL_KBN, TYPE_KBN, HELPER_NAME, GENERATION, DATA_SOURCE, COMMENTS, UP_JGI_NO, IS_DATE, UP_DATE, UP_SCRN_ID, UP_FUNC_ID FROM ORAUSR01.M_RDM_FW_HELPER_MATRIX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORAUSR01.M_RDM_FW_HELPER_MATRIX(SCREEN_ID, FUNCTION_ID, INITIAL_KBN, TYPE_KBN, HELPER_NAME, GENERATION, DATA_SOURCE, COMMENTS, UP_JGI_NO, IS_DATE, UP_DATE, UP_SCRN_ID, UP_FUNC_ID) VALUES (#{screenId}, #{functionId}, #{initialKbn}, #{typeKbn}, #{helperName}, #{generation}, #{dataSource}, #{comments}, #{upJgiNo}, #{isDate}, #{upDate}, #{upScrnId}, #{upFuncId})
mapper.update: UPDATE ORAUSR01.M_RDM_FW_HELPER_MATRIX SET INITIAL_KBN = #{update.initialKbn},INITIAL_KBN = NULL,TYPE_KBN = #{update.typeKbn},TYPE_KBN = NULL,HELPER_NAME = #{update.helperName},HELPER_NAME = NULL,GENERATION = #{update.generation},GENERATION = NULL,DATA_SOURCE = #{update.dataSource},DATA_SOURCE = NULL,COMMENTS = #{update.comments},COMMENTS = NULL,UP_JGI_NO = #{update.upJgiNo},UP_JGI_NO = NULL,IS_DATE = #{update.isDate},IS_DATE = NULL,UP_DATE = #{update.upDate},UP_DATE = NULL,UP_SCRN_ID = #{update.upScrnId},UP_SCRN_ID = NULL,UP_FUNC_ID = #{update.upFuncId},UP_FUNC_ID = NULL, WHERE SCREEN_ID = #{search.screenId} AND FUNCTION_ID = #{search.functionId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ORAUSR01.M_RDM_FW_HELPER_MATRIX WHERE SCREEN_ID = #{screenId} AND FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId}
